name: Greater Dye of WIT <Wit+2 Men-2>
description: Greater Dye of WIT <Wit+2 Men-2>. Collect and take 10 units of this type of magical dye to the symbol maker in town and you will receive a symbol that boosts your abilities tattooed onto your body. Can be used by the Wizard class and the Healer class after completion of their second class transfer, and can be kept and used after the completion of the third class transfer as well

name: Red Soul Crystal
description: A red crystal that absorbs souls. Once saturated it bestows special abilities to a weapon. 26 MP is consumed each time it is used

name: Broken Red Soul Crystal
description: A red-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless

name: Broken Green Soul Crystal
description: A green-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless

name: Broken Blue Soul Crystal
description: A blue-colored crystal that absorbs souls. An internal imbalance between absorbed souls has rendered it useless

name: Pipette Knife
description: An instrument used to collect the blood of living creatures. Use it to cut Baium and obtain a blood sample

name: Reiria's Soul Orb
description: A sphere containing Reiria's Soul. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Kernon's Infernium Scepter
description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the demon Kernon. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Golkonda's Infernium Scepter
description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from Golkond the Longhorn General. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Hallate's Infernium Scepter
description: A scepter made of infernium that was recovered from the Death Lord Hallate. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Maestro Reorin's Hammer
description: A hammer used by a blacksmith. It is made by processing an adamantite nugget of high purity. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Maestro Reorin's Mold
description: A mold used by Dwarven Artisans to manufacture top grade equipment. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Infernium Varnish
description: Varnish used when manufacturing an infernium weapon. Take it to Maestro Reorin

name: Red Pipette Knife
description: Pipette knife that holds Baium's blood. Bring it to Magister Casper at Hardin's Academy

name: Potion of Critical Escape
description: Misdirects enemy attack, inhibits speed of user

name: Decrease Haste Potion
description: Decreases one's level of Aggression

name: Bless of Eva
description: Allows one to breathe under water for extended periods

name: Potion of Revenge
description: Reduces P. Def. and reflects damage back upon enemy
